Core collaboration goals.match_description: Non‑tech founder meets an engineer who can own the tech stack—idea + coding = complete team.
Small startup needs its first designer/marketer/etc.; candidate wants exactly that role.
Dev, designer, and PM with complementary skills team up to build a project under a deadline.
Academic with a prototype links to a company that can bring it to market—brains + muscle.
Founder seeking funding meets an investor looking for new deals—money meets pitch.
Open‑source lead needs hands on deck; developers want first PR credit.
Agency offers a service; organization needs that scoped expertise.
Freelancer wants short contracts; startup needs quick help—easy win‑win.
SaaS vendor meets the budget‑holder manager—seller + buyer.
Company wants to sponsor; event team needs sponsors—perfect fit.
Fintech founder needs legal setup; lawyer wants clients in tech/finance.

Learning & mentoring.match_description: Senior pro happy to teach pairs with junior eager to learn.
Two mid‑level peers team up to study and practice together.
Workshop host fills seats with attendees wanting that exact skill.
Professional changing fields meets an experienced guide.
Professor recruits a student whose thesis matches the lab’s focus.

Skill relationships.match_description: Backend dev links with UI designer—each brings what the other needs.
Two Rust performance geeks swap deep‑dive tips.
Team missing QA finds a test‑automation specialist.
Designer learns DevOps tricks while DevOps engineer picks up UX tips.

Industry / domain focus.match_description: Two fintech builders compare common pain points.
Health‑tech founder gets AI expertise from a generalist engineer.
Med‑device startup meets an FDA compliance consultant.

Hobby & social glue.match_description: Two runners plan a morning jog together.
Board‑game fans organize an evening session.
Spanish native pairs with English native to practice each other’s language.
Musicians meet up to play instruments together.
Ramen lovers plan a late‑night tasting tour.

Values & culture fit.match_description: Remote‑first workers share tips on async workflows.
Women‑in‑tech professionals gather for a roundtable.
Quiet 1‑on‑1 coffee meets for those who avoid loud mixers.

Seniority & career stage.match_description: Two interns pair up to navigate the event together.
Two architects debate high‑level design trade‑offs.
C‑suite leaders share war stories over breakfast.

Logistics & constraints.match_description: Attendees from the same city arrange a post‑event coffee.
Profiles within ±3 h overlap for easy meetings.
Weekend‑only collaborators match with weekend availability.
Early‑bird attendees split an airport taxi.
Freelancers team up to rent an Airbnb.

Preferences & vetoes.match_description: AI team needs a CUDA expert—only those profiles qualify.
Founder prefers healthcare background but is open to others.
Designer explicitly avoids crypto projects—those are filtered out.
Ex‑CTO who wants an IC role ranks lower for CTO positions.

Group‑size quirks.match_description: Solo UX designer matches with several dev teams needing design.
Two small startups explore a product integration partnership.
Data, design, PM, and dev experts form a balanced panel.

Edge & data‑quality cases.match_description: Profile with minimal info still yields reasonable suggestions.
Typos and emojis don’t break parsing or matching logic.
Near‑identical profiles are hidden to avoid echo.
Salesy profiles are down‑ranked or removed.
Obvious AI‑generated profiles are flagged for review.

Misc special situations.match_description: Deaf attendee pairs with a sign‑language interpreter.
Developer seeking EU relocation meets a visa‑specialist recruiter.
Founder connects with a GDPR compliance lawyer.
University team offering data meets an ML researcher.
IoT startup finds a PCB fabrication vendor.
Volunteers link with a charity needing a website.
Meetup hosts swap speaker lists and resources.
Attendee signs up to help at the registration desk.
Startups swap leftover T‑shirts and stickers for cross‑promo.
